messages.title: Dear Resident
messages.content: I understand you are considering voting Plaid in the General Election and that you will be voting by post.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Deal on funding and powers as Scotland
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensure Wales has the same deal on funding and powers as Scotland
Save & strengthen our NHS – restore services including our A&E
Protect jobs and services – increase/inject £30 billion cuts to help

mentions.tacticalSituation: In 2010, Labour’s majority over Plaid was only 4,701 votes in Llanelli so that, at last, Llanelli is a winnable seat for Plaid at the Westminster Election.

issues.health: Save & strengthen our NHS – restore services including our A&E.
issues.socialWelfare: Protect jobs and services – increase/inject £30 billion cuts to help.

leaflet.personalStatement: I understand you are considering voting Plaid in the General Election and that you will be voting by post. That Plaid Cymru is the only party that can and does devote all its energy to getting the very best deal for Wales and sharing its people is now widely accepted. This has been amply demonstrated by Plaid Cymru's MPs punching far above their weight, a fact generally acknowledged by MPs of all political parties.

quotes.text: Wales' other MPs do not always put their constituents and the people of Wales first because they are duty bound to vote as instructed, to their London-based political masters.

images.caption: A picture of Candidate Vaughan Williams.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Have been described as the 'kingmakers' in the last election – the people who can hold the balance of power. Therefore, your vote is critical.
